attachments.title: Allow admin to activate or deactivate users-- Rails
attachments.text: I've managed to make an app that works only to sign up and to log in. Currently, I'm allowing users by mail account activation (following this tutorial: <https://www.railstutorial.org/book/>
attachments.fallback: Allow admin to activate or deactivate users-- Rails

text: <@U4F33615G> Don't forget to download slack into your phone. I made a trello board for RAD assignment 2, but we dont have to be as strict with it. It's just to help us keep track of our tasks.
